item.title: Supply shortfall results in sudden onion price-hike
item.description: The country produced 4.4 million tonnes of onion in the 2024-25 growing season, exceeding the estimated demand of 3.5 million tonnes. However, there is now a shortage of onions, and the price has increased. The prices of locally produced onions have surged recently at both farm and retail levels.
